title: 300. Why Don’t We All Speak the Same Language? (Earth 2.0 Series)
description: There are 7,000 languages spoken on Earth. What are the costs — and benefits — of our modern-day Tower of Babel?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
